message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $13,000.  I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $8,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested, but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
